Blog.post: urlLink Multiplay UK - The UKs # 1 LAN Organisers and home of the I-Series : " About: i21 The great summer i-series! Taking advantage of the August bank holiday weekend, our summer i-series event is 4 days long. This gives everyone an extra full 24 hours of game time, and allows us to do a lot more fun things at the event, such as a load more fun competitions. With 600 initial BYOC spaces (Bring Your Own Computer), and scope to expand well beyond 1000, it's going to be one blast of an event! Quick info: 9 AM on Friday 27th August to 6pm on Monday the 30th of August 2004. 100 Mbps internet connection (courtesy of BT) 600 initial BYOC spaces. �70 for Participant entry (Covers all 4 days). �5 per day for Spectator entry. Services Available: Early Arrival (Thursday night arrival), Co-location Servers, Monitor Rental, Laptop Network Connections Official World Cyber Games 2004 UK Preliminary About: i-Series Our i-Series events are currently the largest LAN gaming event in the UK. Featuring several hundred gamers from all over the UK and abroad, they bring together like-minded people in a social and fun atmosphere. You experience games as they were meant to be played over our high speed Local Area Network (LAN), at the UK�s premier LAN party! Whether you have just bought your first game or you are a gaming professional then our i-Series has something for you. Many hundreds of gamers attend each of these events and you could be one of them. Check out the rest of this site and we look forward to seeing you at our next i-Series event!"

urlLink Motilium details information treatment advice online UK : "What Is Motilium 10? Motilium 10 is a remedy specifically developed to relieve queasy, heavy bloated stomach symptoms. Motilium 10 can clear these symptoms, often experienced after eating and drinking, to help get your stomach working properly again. What Symptoms Can It Treat? Feeling sick or queasy (nausea) Excessive fullness Heavy bloated feeling Burping (belching) Stomach ache (general discomfort or a dull ache) How Does Motilium 10 Work? Motilium 10 helps restore your stomachs' natural digestive rhythm and therefore helps to move food normally through the system. That's why your GP or pharmacist might refer to Motilium 10 as a 'motility' product. You see, your digestive system needs help to keep 'on the move' to function properly and that is where Motilium 10 comes in; it helps the stomach to restore the normal flow of food through the system. Unlike other products available for you to purchase, Motilium 10 is the only remedy that specifically relieves dysmotility (when your stomach's processing powers slow down, leaving you with a queasy, heavy bloated stomach) and the uncomfortable symptoms that can go with it. The Benefit of Motilium 10 Whether it's fullness, a heavy bloated stomach, queasiness or nausea, after eating or drinking, Motilium 10 can help relieve these symptoms by restoring the stomach's natural rhythm. It is unlike any other treatment because it works in a completely different way. Most other stomach or digestive discomfort remedies available for purchase target acid symptoms. Motilium 10 helps your stomach to work properly so that food can move on through your system. Once your stomach is working properly again your symptoms should go away. How "

Finally took the plunge to find out what this whole blogging this is about. Seemed simple to setup, not sure about how to post comments and personal thoughts and actually sharing these with everyone. Probably keep it sane for a while and see how it goes. Still excited by the prospect though. BoomerKC
